author: Aaron Craze
method: Preheat the oven to 150C/130C Fan/Gas 2. Put the rice in a 1-litre/1¾-pint baking dish, then mix in the sugar and milk. Place the dish on a baking tray and bake for 1¾-2 hours, or until the rice is soft and the mixture thickened with a golden top. Set aside. Remove the stalks from the strawberries. Rinse the fruit, then put it in a bowl and mash using a fork until almost smooth. Serve the rice pudding warm with a spoonful of mashed strawberries on top.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz pudding rice, rinsed,  40g/1½oz caster sugar,  750ml/1¼ pint semi-skimmed milk,  200g/7oz strawberries
